def: An eruptive rock characterized by the presence of chrysolite(peridot). It also usually contains pyroxene, enstatite, chromite,etc. It is often altered to serpentine.
To take the saddle off; to unsaddle. [Obs.] Jervas.
A species of Alth√¶a (A. rosea), bearing flowers of variouscolors; -- called also rose mallow.
To sparkle or shine; especially, to shine with a mild, subdued,and fitful luster; to emit a soft, scintillating light; to gleam; as,the glistening stars.
That which is thrown into a scale to make weight; something oflittle account added to supply a deficiency or fill a gap.

To perform acts of homage or adoration; esp., to performreligious service.Our fathers worshiped in this mountain; and ye say that in Jerusalemis the place where men ought to worship. John iv. 20.Was it for this I have loved . . . and worshiped in silenceLongfellow.
